title: Space bar not centering on champion in-game.
body:
I would like to know if it's intended or a client malfunction that when I hold space bar while in unlocked screen and try to push off-screen while it's held down the default view changes when I hit space.  As in--it no longer centers on the champion, it'll go to that 'new' place until I set a new place for the space bar to take me when I hit it.

I've tried deleting the config and persisted settings but it doesn't change it.

There have been other posts on it, but never a reply.
example: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/JkaBdjfo-space-bar-not-working

replies.body:
It sounds like you may have 'Semi-locked' camera mode enabled. This mode allows you to use locked mode, but you can offset where the lock is placed. This is especially useful during laning phase and is my personal favourite camera mode. Since you're not digging it, you can simply change to another camera mode in your settings. 

Here's a screenshot of where the setting is (click to enlarge it).

http://i.imgur.com/bIPNFSl.png

Let me know if you have any questions.

Thank you very much for the clear reply.

Space bar just started acting weird a few patches ago :/

I never used to try to move my camera while holding space I guess.
I'm getting used to it now and it seems useful,
but was just wondering if that's what its intended behaviour was.

I'll have a lot of fun now that I know I have full power on the lock^^

So, for reference: per-side offset and fixed offset both put it back the way it was before?
Per-side offset is the default camera setting, so I'd imagine that's what you were using before. So in short - yes, that should bring it back to what it used to be.
then check your macros in options / try resetting it

Thanks for trying to help; Targons Blade explained it to me.^^
Turns out it was the intended behaviour of semi-locked mode.
drag your mouse into the minimap and it will unlock camera

You mean it'll make space bar center on the champ again?

I'm saying that the camera is already unlocked, but when I hit space it doesn't 'center' back on my champ.
